alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:07PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Twin Falls, southeastern Elmore, eastern Owyhee and western Gooding Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 907 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Blair Trail Reservoir to near Crows Nest Butte. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Glenns Ferry, Blair Trail Reservoir, King Hill and Deadman Flat around 910 PM MDT. Bliss around 930 PM MDT. Hagerman, White Arrow Hot Spring and Twentymile Butte around 940 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
